      Integer getAmountTributesOnline()
      Returns the amount of tributes currently playing on the server.

      Returns a BukkitGames API instance.
      GameState getCurrentGameState()
      Returns the current GameState.
      Boolean playerAbilityIsOnCooldown(Player player, Integer abilityID, Boolean message)
      Returns true if the given ability is on cooldown for the given player, ignoring if the player can actually use the given ability.
      Boolean playerCanUseAbility(Player player, Integer abilityID, Boolean message)
      Returns true if that player has the given ability and the ability is not on cooldown.
      Boolean playerHasCooldown(Player player, Integer abilityID)
      Returns true if that player has the given ability, ignoring cooldown.
      void playerSetCooldown(Player player, Integer abilityID, Integer seconds)
      Sets a cooldown for an ability of that player.
      void registerNewAbility(Integer id, String name, String description)
      Registers a new ability, needs to be called in onEnable().

      • playerCanUseAbility

        public Boolean playerCanUseAbility(Player player,
                          Integer abilityID,
                          Boolean message)
        Returns true if that player has the given ability and the ability is not on cooldown. Will send a message to the player, if message is set to true and ability is on cooldown.
        Parameters:
        player -
        abilityID -
        message -
        Returns:
        Boolean
